info.title: About Terra
info.description1: Terra allows users to report civic complaints or share compliments anonymously. Each report appears on an interactive map that local authorities can view and address. Simply select a tile, submit your report, and explore what others have shared by clicking on the map markers.
info.description2: Your location data helps place reports accurately, but no personally identifiable information is ever collected. A locally stored, auto-generated user ID is used only to prevent duplicate submissions.
info.description3: To keep information current and relevant, all reports are automatically deleted after 90 days.
